BR_text.BRsummary: When resize_keep_ratio is False, rescaling for masks does not work.
BR_text.BRdescription:
Thanks for your error report and we appreciate it a lot.
 Checklist
 
 I have searched related issues but cannot get the expected help.
 The bug has not been fixed in the latest version.
 
 Describe the bug
 When resize_keep_ratio=False, rescaling for masks in loading the dataset will not work. The error is:
 <denchmark-code>Scale must be a number or tuple of int, but got <class 'numpy.ndarray'>
 </denchmark-code>

comments_0.comment_text: Thanks for reporting! It will be fixed.

comments_1.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/open-mmlab/mmdetection/pull/883>#883</denchmark-link>
 
 here are the bug fix pr.
